metadata.title: CVE-2023-38408 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: remote code execution relating to PKCS#11 providers

notes.note: seth-arnold> openssh-ssh1 is provided for compatibility with old devices that cannot be upgraded to modern protocols. Thus we may not provide security support for this package if doing so would prevent access to equipment.

criterions.comment: openssh: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of life').
openssh-ssh1 package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
